Title: Tome-wan
Writer: Bryan Fuller (developed for television by), Thomas Harris (characters from the book "Red Dragon"), Chris Brancato, Bryan Fuller, Scott Nimerfro
Actors: Hugh Dancy, Mads Mikkelsen, Caroline Dhavernas, Laurence Fishburne
Plot: During a therapy session, Will shares a vision of how he would kill Hannibal. Meanwhile, an increasingly impatient Jack brings in a surprise witness to help Will catch Hannibal.
